name: Red is Love, Passion, and Blood
name_original: Red is Love, Passion, and Blood
description:
This is a choose your own adventure game made for Confession Jam II. 

In this game,  you are a man with a secret life, unbeknownst to your SO. In day, you are with her, but at night, you are an assassin of those who pray on the most innocent and vulnerable of society.

The summary being said, I have an nsfw tag on this project for a reason. I am also going to include a trigger warning for those who get flashbacks easily. While there is nothing explicit in this game, due to the very heavy subject matter of the game, I am putting both label on here.  

Other than that, I hope you enjoy this game.
